mapper.insert: insert into BOOKWRITER.T_CASE_RECORD (CASE_REC_NO, CONSULTATION_DATE, MAIN_SYMPTOM, STAFF_CODE, PATIENT_NO) values (#{caseRecNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{consultationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mainSymptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{patientNo,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select CASE_REC_NO, CONSULTATION_DATE, MAIN_SYMPTOM, STAFF_CODE, PATIENT_NO from BOOKWRITER.T_CASE_RECORD
